content: सिव् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (सीव्यति, स्यूत) {@--1@} To sew, darn, stitch together; मनोभवः सीव्यति दुर्यशःपटौ <ls>N. 1. 80</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 10.</ls> {@--2@} To unite, bring or join together; स हि स्नेहात्मकस्तंतुरंतर्मर्माणि सीव्यति <ls>U. 5. 17.</ls> --WITH अनु to string together, connect very closely or uninterruptedly.
